content:
TELEGRAM
reign Service of the United States of America
INCOMING
UNCLASSIFIED Classification
Control:
Reed: March 7, 1962
FRON : W C MILNER CHIEF SPECIAL PROGRAMS BR UTILIZATION DIV GSA WASHINGTON
DATE: March 69 1962
TO : AID TAIPEI
REUR WX, 2-28-62, only TUG currently available meeting your requiremsyt is an 85FT. Harbor diesel, 650HP, steel hull No. ST679, acquisition cost $400,000, in R-2 condion, located 許耀爾 Charleston, North Carolina Estimate of rehabilitation cost 140.112.213.82 will be obtained and forwarded soonest possible.
ACTION : FO
INFO: D PO/SP (3) X/C&R (2) AmEmb (2)
國史饭 Academia Historica nes chef 13 PROHIBITED UNLESS "UMCLASSIFIED"
FORM FS-501 2-21-58
Classification
351
